DOC.brief_summary: To determine ZD6474 new investigational drug , effective treat Non Small Lung Cancer , compare another type anti cancer therapy chemotherapy , Erlotinib
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Trial Comparing ZD6474 With Erlotinib NSCLC After Failure Least One Prior Chemotherapy
DOC.criteria: Confirmed locally advance metastatic NSCLC Failure least one two prior chemotherapy regimens Prior treatment erlotinib ( Tarceva ) , gefitinib ( IRESSA ) , sunitinib ( Sutent ) , sorafenib ( Nexavar ) Chemotherapy type anti cancer therapy within 4 week study start
